positive.review:
This game 3D art is good among 3D NSFW games and it's ga-cha.

Like most of its genre, you need to build up your team until it is strong enough to complete events. Pay for fast process or wait is up to you, because if you can complete events it gives you the ability to buy material to upgrade your character, which can't be gotten from other sources but only by buying with real money. Sometimes the game just gives those as gifts.

After your team is stable, daily routine takes less than ten minutes. Only update days take more. So this game respects your time more than any ga-cha game I ever played, even SFW ones. PVP is optional. You may try PVP for more free rewards, but the game does not force you to do so.

You may pick a low-price monthly pass for the long run. It's worth.

P.S. I use Copilot AI to help correct my grammar. All writing is mine.
Mid, like most JRPG NSFW games. Not bad cut scenes they'll get  you there just boring having the same style for everything after awhile.

I can't make up my mind on this game. I don't care about the adult scenes so much, I just skip them. I don't mind the gem system, but dear god, they are pricey and not worth it. azure lane has better deals on their gacha cubes than this game does.
great game not recomended for those who are under 18   great game play
Best Game Turn Based With 18+ :D
good game hehe...
its A awesome game!!
Super, thanks!
不错
The Goddesses ✨
The Goddesses ✨

This was a fun game for a while. I've played it for maybe 3(?) years if I remember correctly. But it's still a Gatcha game at the end of the day. My main complaint is the drop % of the event personas. I personally think they are way too low; when in majority of cases, you probably won't use them or break the typical meta. The Animations are good and pretty well done and they've gotten better over the years, that's for sure. 

All 'n all. I'll admit I put maybe too much money into this game, but I only bought something like 2 to 4 times a month total so it's not that big of a deal for me. I dunno. If they every raise the % rate of the event personas then maybe I'll come back.

If you're bored and want to look at pretty good character models and adult animations to unlock in time, go for it. It's really not a bad game for what it is, honestly. And the Devs do update it regularly. And looking back at what the game was when I first started; a ton has changed. 

I'll recommend the game because I think it's good when you look at it as it should be. But don't go in thinking that it's a eye popping ground breaking product. Fair warning. It is still a simple Mobile game with Hentai elements included.
Words cannot describe how good this game is, just try it yourself and remember ~F2P, patience is key, it doesn't take long anyways

Very addictive gameplay, Which is normal for a gacha game, What sets it apart is the realistic graphics & unique story, Which then gives a variety in gameplay themes and strategy, Its very expensive, But it does open the door for people to capitalize without spending a dime, However pvp is more or less pay to win, For a h-game, alot of hard work went into the the combat which i respect and will give this game the thumbs up.

This game 3D art is good among 3D NSFW games and it's ga-cha.

Like most of its genre, you need to build up your team until it is strong enough to complete events. Pay for fast process or wait is up to you, because if you can complete events it gives you the ability to buy material to upgrade your character, which can't be gotten from other sources but only by buying with real money. Sometimes the game just gives those as gifts.

After your team is stable, daily routine takes less than ten minutes. Only update days take more. So this game respects your time more than any ga-cha game I ever played, even SFW ones. PVP is optional. You may try PVP for more free rewards, but the game does not force you to do so.

You may pick a low-price monthly pass for the long run. It's worth.

P.S. I use Copilot AI to help correct my grammar. All writing is mine.
the graphic is really good,and the gameplay is also enjoyable

I've only played about 4 days, but probably spent close to 4 hours a day on average. I haven't purchased anything yet, and I've made it to level 32. 4 SSR girls and have Inase up to UR. I've personally enjoyed it, and will likely spend some money to support the game. Kind of exactly what I wanted to find, hope it continues to improve, and if I had one major recommendation... it would be to make leveling a little easier to progress with the story. I see some have commented that the game is too hard if you aren't at the recommended level. I've consistently fought against higher levels, but I was careful with how I utilized my rewards to strengthen my girls. 100% would recommend to someone looking for some adult gaming.

After playing the game for a while, this game is quite interesting, the gameplay is easy, the graphics are good (better than playing the android or ios version)
I can rate this game as quite good for entertainment, or to collect characters.

A pretty in depth game for an H game, lots of mechanics to learn but you can also auto fight things and play one handed ;) Graphics 10/10

The p2w/gacha aspect is insane and really sucks you in. You really don't need to spend any extra money on it, but wow do they make it tempting. -1000$

Well in the end, most of us come for the Adult contain, no need to try hard. So in my opinion, quite a good game. Of course all the gacha games are p2w and money grabbing. The developers spent lots of time n money to make this game, of course they need to get their salary paid. Old-school games in the past make ppl grind a lot, now you can pay to progress much faster, still people just wanna go to end game to farm, not enjoying the progressing slowly.
Mid, like most JRPG NSFW games. Not bad cut scenes they'll get  you there just boring having the same style for everything after awhile.

I can't make up my mind on this game. I don't care about the adult scenes so much, I just skip them. I don't mind the gem system, but dear god, they are pricey and not worth it. azure lane has better deals on their gacha cubes than this game does.
this is a gacha style game with Very adult rated scenes and storyline. lol dont play in a public place fair warning
great game not recomended for those who are under 18   great game play

Relaxing and fair gameplay

Forced to play with Phoenix yet I do not like kiddie girls.

Mixing of modern characters in a fantasy game
There is a mobile version of this game. I will comeback update this review when I do enough digging.

Gacha like any others.
Game itself is great + all the gooning

nice game so far. After playing I think there should be more stamina given in the game for free. If the game wasnt good Id give it a thumbs down . I am thinking on quitting the game do to the lack of stamina . Its not worth the money to buy Stamina .
I enjoyed it. crazy addictive and fun
A quality porn game? A surprise to be sure, but a welcome one.
Love the game. Its a must buy.

very very good game

This was a fun game for a while. I've played it for maybe 3(?) years if I remember correctly. But it's still a Gatcha game at the end of the day. My main complaint is the drop % of the event personas. I personally think they are way too low; when in majority of cases, you probably won't use them or break the typical meta. The Animations are good and pretty well done and they've gotten better over the years, that's for sure. 

All 'n all. I'll admit I put maybe too much money into this game, but I only bought something like 2 to 4 times a month total so it's not that big of a deal for me. I dunno. If they every raise the % rate of the event personas then maybe I'll come back.

If you're bored and want to look at pretty good character models and adult animations to unlock in time, go for it. It's really not a bad game for what it is, honestly. And the Devs do update it regularly. And looking back at what the game was when I first started; a ton has changed. 

I'll recommend the game because I think it's good when you look at it as it should be. But don't go in thinking that it's a eye popping ground breaking product. Fair warning. It is still a simple Mobile game with Hentai elements included.
Words cannot describe how good this game is, just try it yourself and remember ~F2P, patience is key, it doesn't take long anyways

Very addictive gameplay, Which is normal for a gacha game, What sets it apart is the realistic graphics & unique story, Which then gives a variety in gameplay themes and strategy, Its very expensive, But it does open the door for people to capitalize without spending a dime, However pvp is more or less pay to win, For a h-game, alot of hard work went into the the combat which i respect and will give this game the thumbs up.

negative.review: just another gacha, get limited "energy/ stamina" to play then you gotta pay to play. i wanted to give a good review because it does have some good scenes on pc, but the fact you literally have to stop playing just makes me not want to load it back up.

PROS:
- AAA 3D hentai goodness
- 60 hours playtime without the need of paying

CONS:
- there is a paywall
- characters cannot advanced level 65 without paying
- not many contents
- will install DENUVO DRM
Paywall, Gacha, P2W etc etc etc. Play until you get your characters to about lvl 50, then unistall and move on with your life.

Level 49, everything stops. There's no more stamina, no new list of challenges to complete to keep things flowing. You get 180 stamina, replenishes 1 every 10 mins, but the required stamina per mission is 40, so I've been able to play only 4 missions every 24 hours. Their cost of packs are + $100 with nothing exclusive or special
Not a great game because it cost you money to build up and play.

It is an ok game as far as gacha games go.  But there are so many purchase pop-ups and stores the screen gets so cluttered it can be confusing, and it has a lot of network connection errors, I have great internet speed with fiber optic and a good pc and higher end graphics card, and do not have problems with any other games
increase stamina, if possible playing main story without stamina

just another gacha, get limited "energy/ stamina" to play then you gotta pay to play. i wanted to give a good review because it does have some good scenes on pc, but the fact you literally have to stop playing just makes me not want to load it back up.

PROS:
- AAA 3D hentai goodness
- 60 hours playtime without the need of paying

CONS:
- there is a paywall
- characters cannot advanced level 65 without paying
- not many contents
- will install DENUVO DRM
Completely evil Monetization scheme. I take back every bad thing I said about Blue Archive.
if you you don't use the paywall shit you'll never win unless even at recommended levels , you have to buy the nice things to stand a chance

BRUH @_@

A fucking mobile game. P2W and Denuvo DRM ??????????? wtf 
isnt worth it at all

Paywall, Gacha, P2W etc etc etc. Play until you get your characters to about lvl 50, then unistall and move on with your life.

Level 49, everything stops. There's no more stamina, no new list of challenges to complete to keep things flowing. You get 180 stamina, replenishes 1 every 10 mins, but the required stamina per mission is 40, so I've been able to play only 4 missions every 24 hours. Their cost of packs are + $100 with nothing exclusive or special
